attributes.action: make it illegal for councils or third parties anywhere in the UK to charge "toilet tax" for the use of public toilets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Using the toilet is a natural biological function. Charging to use public toilets amounts to a stealth tax on nature which should be outlawed - the sooner the better.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
